Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem. 

Shuttle buses are requested between Roosevelt and 95th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
